code:
var incrementString=function incrementString(string){// Convert pass args to string
var str=string.toString();// Extract string's number
var number=str.match(/\d+/)===null?0:str.match(/\d+/)[0];// Store number's length
var numberLength=number.length;// Increment number by 1
number=(parseInt(number)+1).toString();// If there were leading 0s, add them again
while(number.length<numberLength){number='0'+number;}return str.replace(/[0-9]/g,'').concat(number);};export default incrementString;
